## Reading in data

cleaning with clean_names() and rename(new_name = "old_name")

```{r}
chlorophyll_data <- read_csv(here::here("data", "toolik_chlorophyll.csv"), na = c(".")) |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  rename(chl_a = "active_chl_a_ug_l")
```
